volumio_info.details:
RemotePi Plugin


The plugin enables support for RemotePi boards for Raspberry Pi 4, Pi 3 B+, Pi 3, Pi 2, B+ and B.
With the plugin the RemotePi board will manage cutting the power after Volumio has been shut down via the GUI or the RemotePi board's hardware knob has been pressed or a infrared power off signal (learned-in to the RemotePi board) has been received.
